content: * *Shaw Plaza**, also known as **Shaw Plaza-Twin Heights,** is a mixed-use development in [Balestier](/wiki/Balestier), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## History The plaza was opened in 1999, replacing an earlier Shaw Plaza, which had existed for at least fourteen years. The earlier Shaw Plaza was home to the [Hoover Theatre](/wiki/Hoover_Theatre), and the President Theatre, by the [Shaw Organisation](/wiki/Shaw_Organisation). The plaza is located along [Balestier Road](/wiki/Balestier_Road), and contains 132 residential units on top of the shopping plaza. However, the residential units are separated from the mall. The shopping centre also included the Balestier Cineplex, which replaced the Hoover Theatre. The cineplex had six screens. The entire complex underwent renovation works which finished in March 2023. After renovation, the new cineplex reopened with eleven screens. This article about a Singapore building or structure is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e 1°19′30″N 103°50′47″E﻿ / ﻿1.3251°N 103.8465°E﻿ / 1.3251; 103.8465
title: Shaw Plaza
